detail.name: Table2SC
detail.summary: Convert HTML Table to Spreadsheet or PDF.
detail.author: OSSII R&D Team. <https://www.ossii.com.tw/>
detail.description: This service provides conversion of HTML Table content into spreadsheet or PDF format.

adminIcon.desc: Please refer to https://icons.getbootstrap.com/ for icon names.

level.desc: Can be 0-8, or none (turns off logging), fatal, critical, error, warning, notice, information, debug, trace

property.name: rotation
property.desc: Log file rotation strategy. See Poco FileChannel.

property.name: archive
property.desc: Append either timestamp or number to the archived log filename.

property.name: times
property.desc: Specifies whether times for rotation are treated as local or UTC. Valid values are local and utc.

property.name: purgeAge
property.desc: The maximum age of log files to preserve. See Poco FileChannel.

property.name: purgeCount
property.desc: The maximum number of log archives to preserve. Use 'none' to disable purging. See Poco FileChannel.

property.name: rotateOnOpen
property.desc: Enable/disable log file rotation on opening.

property.name: flush
property.desc: Enable/disable flushing after logging each line. May harm performance. Note that without flushing after each line, the log lines from the different processes will not appear in chronological order.
